channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump plans to meet with Venezuela opposition leader Maria Corina Machado next week
item.description: President Donald Trump said on Thursday that he plans to meet with Venezuelan opposition leader Maria Corina Machado in Washington next week.

item.title: Singapore-based startup founder Anand Roy thinks generative AI can help fix a broken music sector
item.description: Roy started Wubble in 2024; now his generated tunes are used by global giants and even the Taipei Metro, to soothe harried commuters.

item.title: President Trump says there won't be a 'second Wave of Attacks' against Venezuela due to their 'cooperation'
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump said that due to "cooperation," he has "cancelled the previously expected second Wave of Attacks" against Venezuela.

item.title: Dear Trump, Send In The Troops To Minneapolis Or Risk Losing The Country To Lawlessness
item.description: There is no time this time around for Trump to hem and haw around defiant Democrats. He must initiate a crackdown now.
